content: In what popular video game series do players control an Italian-American plumber named Mario as he rescues Princess Peach from the villainous Bowser?

The popular video game series you're referring to is "Super Mario Bros." created by Nintendo. In this series, players control Mario, an Italian-American plumber, as he navigates through various levels filled with obstacles and enemies to rescue Princess Peach from the clutches of the villainous Bowser. The franchise has been incredibly successful and has spanned multiple platforms and gaming generations.
